address.addrLine: Address: Per “Unicorn” St[eam ShipA steam coaster, built in Glasgow 1836, that plied between Boston and Halifax, where the Cunard ships took on mail for the Atlantic crossing. by way of Halifax.] | John Di[ckens Esquire] |…Al[phington]Where CD’s parents had been living since Mar 39. | D[evon].
